Writer: Jez Butterworth (screenplay), John-Henry Butterworth (screenplay), Joseph Wilson (book), Valerie Plame Wilson (book)
Plot: CIA operative Valerie Plame discovers her identity is allegedly leaked by the government as payback for an op-ed article her husband wrote criticizing the Bush administration.
Title: Fair Game
Actors: Naomi Watts, Sonya Davison, Vanessa Chong, Anand Tiwari
